value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. value.excerpt: Are you using Power BI incremental refresh? Have you had it not work even though you set everything up?
